pageDescription: All areas of ozone technology application: medicine, agriculture, food production, HoReCa, water treatment and more.

medicine.title: Medicine
medicine.description: Ozonation for medical facilities provides the highest level of sterility, meeting SanPiN requirements. Effective against all types of pathogens, including chlorine-resistant viruses.

agriculture.title: Agriculture
agriculture.description: Ozonation in agriculture improves yields, extends product shelf life and ensures biosecurity. An eco-friendly alternative to chemical pesticides and preservatives.

food-production.title: Food Production
food-production.description: Ozonation in the food industry extends shelf life, ensures product safety and compliance with sanitary standards without the use of chemical additives.

horeca.title: HoReCa
horeca.description: Hotels, restaurants and cafes use ozonation to create a comfortable environment, eliminate odors and ensure high hygiene standards.

water-treatment.title: Water Treatment
water-treatment.description: Ozone is the most effective and eco-friendly water purification method. 95% of drinking water in Europe is treated with ozone. Does not form dangerous byproducts like chlorine.

disinfection.title: Disinfection
disinfection.description: Ozonation provides deep disinfection of premises and transport, destroying bacteria, viruses and fungi without chemical residues.

cleaning.title: Cleaning
cleaning.description: Ozonation is an effective tool for cleaning companies: eliminating stubborn odors, post-incident disinfection, vehicle treatment.

warehouses.title: Warehouses
warehouses.description: Ozonation of warehouse facilities prevents mold growth, controls odors and ensures the preservation of stored goods.

industry.title: Industry
industry.description: Industrial ozonation solves specific production tasks: oil product removal, facility disinfection, water treatment.

transport.title: Transport
transport.description: Ozonation of vehicles ensures sanitary safety of passenger transportation and cargo containers.

mining-metals.title: Mining & metals
mining-metals.description: Ozone in gold and metal mining: ore pretreatment, leaching enhancement, cyanide destruction, and metal storage and surface cleaning.
